title: Enhanced electromagnetic wave absorption properties of SiCN(Ni)/BN ceramics by in situ generated Ni and Ni3Si
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8293-8302
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA07877A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yanchun Tong, Chunmiao Liu, Chang Liu, Haibin Sun, Yurun Feng, Qiangqiang Hu, Hongying Zhang, Yujun Zhao, Xue Guo, Shigang Wu
The electromagnetic wave loss mechanism of the material in this paper is mainly polarization loss; the minimum reflection loss reaches −53.47 dB, and the effective bandwidth is 2.32 GHz.
